block.walkietalkie.speaker: Speaker
gui.walkietalkie.speaker.title: Speaker
gui.walkietalkie.title: Walkie-Talkie
advancement.walkietalkie.root.title: Walkie Talkie
advancement.walkietalkie.root.descriptio: Discover the power of communication with the walkietalkie.
advancement.walkietalkie.wooden_walkieta: Obtained a wooden walkietalkie, allowing you to communicate over short distances.
advancement.walkietalkie.stone_walkietal: Obtained a stone walkietalkie, allowing for greater communication range.
advancement.walkietalkie.iron_walkietalk: Obtained an iron walkietalkie, increasing communication range even further.
advancement.walkietalkie.diamond_walkiet: Obtained a top-of-the-line diamond walkietalkie, allowing for seamless communication over great distances.
advancement.walkietalkie.netherite_walki: Obtained a state-of-the-art Netherite walkietalkie, providing unprecedented communication range.
